column2: "Oh, hello there! This is my first time meeting you, so I should say, \"Pleased to meet you\", I guess.."
"My name is Azanami, I just joined ARKS recently. Pleased to make your acquaintance."
"Have you had a chance to try out the new class yet?"
"The name, Braver, seems like they put a lot of thought into it..."
"This new class is balanced between close and long range combat."
"At close range it uses the katana and the bullet bow at long range. You focus and deal the blow with one movement."
"Anyways, that's my advertisement. I was the original user of this class, after all."
"It was really hard bringing the best parts of this class together. That's why I feel like I need to let people know about it."
"I showed them the ability, got passed through several tests and finally got the class accepted."
"After that, I had to follow up with the administration to set up a set of skills for it."
"I'm a late bloomer, so I have to do my best to stand out. I've been working extremely hard everyday."
"But it's been fun, and I'm enjoying myself every day."
"It works for me, and everyone as well. Two birds with one stone is what I think you'd call it."
